name: Rodney Sampson II
tagline: iOS and Java Software Engineer and Developer
body:
## Bio
Swift, Objective-C, Java Engineer and Developer. Oracle Certified Associate and Certified Agile Practitioner. Graduate of The Tech Square Labs School of Coding and The Iron Yard. Passionate about game development, intuitive UI design, building my own backend, continuous learning and reading the docs.

## Contact
Atlanta, Georgia  
rsampdev@gmail.com  
[GitHub](github.com/rsampdev)  
[Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/rodney-sampson-ii-28b241112?trk=prof-samename-picture)

## Projects
### Timelines - [Repo](https://github.com/Synsthetics/iOS-Timelines-App)
An iOS app that lets busy people find free time to spend with their loved ones. Input your schedule, add someone as a friend, and then sync your schedule with theirs to find shared free time.

### Event Networking - [Repo](https://github.com/GrumpyCatDevelopmentLLC/EventNetworkingApp)
An iOS app that allows people attending an event to get in touch with the other attendees without having to manually exchange business cards, phone numbers or other contact info.

### Homepwner - [Repo](https://github.com/rsampdev/HomepwnerApp)
An iOS app that keeps an inventory of all your possessions. So that in the case of a fire or other catastrophe, you will have a record for your insurance company.

### Photorama - [Repo](https://github.com/rsampdev/PhotoramaApp)
An iOS app that reads in a list of recent photos from Flickr

### PocketCalc - [Repo](https://github.com/rsampdev/PocketCalc)
An iOS calculator app
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
